properties.name: Marine Transfer Station
properties.description: abandoned marine transfer station for garbage transfer, city owned, fenced off, partially barbed wire, locked with chain padlock [requires bolt cutter], entire building (steel, concrete), two levels, terrace, waterfront area, electicity and plumbing access, paved ground, access ramp for vehicles, boat/ship access

empty lot, city owned, fenced off, locked with gate [requires ladder or angle grinder], two party walls, unfinished ground, sidewalk access, curbside parking, billboard access, close to bus stop W 135 St/Riverside Dr [M5 and M11]
